ComicInfo.Penciller: George Papp,Ruben Moreira,Sheldon Moldoff,Will Ely,George Papp,Bill Ely,Sheldon Moldoff,Ruben Moreira
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Telecast from the Future: After trying to fix it, TV producer Wilbur Miles has a monitor that sees across time and into the future.
Dial M for Magic: A man petitions to join a magicians' club, but since he won't reveal just one of his tricks, it refuses entry to the greatest magician of all, Merlin.
The Forbidden Flowers: Tom Halsey's flowers change color to match the mood of the person nearest, making a guilty man confess.
The Girl in the Bottle: People floating ashore in bottles may appear to be a supernatural occurrence, but it is only a sneaky way to smuggle foreigners into the U.S.
ComicInfo.Title: The Telecast from the Future; Dial M for Magic; The Forbidden Flowers; The Girl in the Bottle
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
